derivation: middle voice from G1223 (διαστέλλομαι) and G4724 (διαστέλλομαι);
strongs_def: to set (oneself) apart (figuratively, distinguish), i.e. (by implication) to enjoin
outline:
1. to draw asunder, divide, distinguish, dispose, order
  2. to open one's self i.e. one's mind, to set forth distinctly
  3. to admonish, order, charge
